original_text: Then he called for his son Solomon and charged him to build a house for the Lord, the God of Israel.
korean_text: 다윗이 그의 아들 솔로몬을 불러 이스라엘 하나님 여호와를 위하여 성전 건축하기를 부탁하여

sentences.original_text: Then he called for his son Solomon
and charged him to build a house
for the Lord, the God of Israel
